fr_FR.description: Ce mod a pour but d'ajouter un système complet de gestion psionique (classe, IA, effets...) basé sur les règles D&D 3.5. Plus de détails dans le [readme](https://www.shsforums.net/topic/55711-readme/) et sur les [capacités psioniques](https://www.shsforums.net/topic/55713-psionic-power-list/).

en_US.description: This mod aims to add a complete psionic management system (class, AI, effects...) based on D&D 3.5 rules. More details in the [readme](https://www.shsforums.net/topic/55711-readme/) and in the [psionic abilities](https://www.shsforums.net/topic/55713-psionic-power-list/).

components.10: Psion class (selectable under the Warrior creation menu)
components.choice_0: Individual AI management for party members
components.62: Install and hide AI switch button

zh_CN.description: 此模组旨在添加一个完整的超能力管理系统（职业、AI、效果等），基于D&D 3.5规则。更多详情请参阅[readme](https://www.shsforums.net/topic/55711-readme/)和[超能力列表](https://www.shsforums.net/topic/55713-psionic-power-list/)。
